## LineTechniqueParams interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface LineTechniqueParams extends BaseTechniqueParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [color](./harp-datasource-protocol.linetechniqueparams.color.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;[StyleColor](./harp-datasource-protocol.stylecolor.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Color of a line in hexadecimal or CSS-style notation, for example: <code>&quot;#e4e9ec&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;#fff&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;rgb(255, 0, 0)&quot;</code>, or <code>&quot;hsl(35, 11%, 88%)&quot;</code>.  color-hex |
|  [lineWidth](./harp-datasource-protocol.linetechniqueparams.linewidth.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Width of line in pixels. WebGL implementations will normally render all lines with 1 pixel width, and ignore this value. |
|  [opacity](./harp-datasource-protocol.linetechniqueparams.opacity.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | For transparent lines, set a value between 0.0 for totally transparent, to 1.0 for totally opaque. |
|  [transparent](./harp-datasource-protocol.linetechniqueparams.transparent.md) | boolean | Set to true if line should appear transparent. Rendering transparent lines may come with a slight performance impact. |
